file_content.text: We're running out of time. You need to go. Now. I'll handle the knights.
It'll be faster if we work together.
We're a team.
I'm not leaving you.
Out of the question.
There's too many of them. You'll be overwhelmed.
You can't fight them alone.
I'd love to, but they're in my way.
Sorry, I can't leave.
Not for long.
Not this time.
We can't allow our feelings to jeopardize the mission.
Don't insult me.
It's your destiny to defeat Arcann--mine is to get you there.
These better not be "last words" I'm hearing.
You better not die on me.
Our destiny is bigger than Arcann, Lana.
[Kiss her]
Then fulfill your destiny.
So get on with it.
You've done more than just get me here, Lana.
Don't sell yourself short.
Don't be so dramatic. I've faced worse than this. Now go!
You always choose the worst times to do that.
Thank you, Commander. It's been an honor.
This isn't about you.
It never has been. But I will do whatever it takes to destroy my father.
Hate to disappoint, but Valkorion's not here.
Sorry, your father is gone.
You made it about me when you imprisoned me--stole years from my life, then tried to kill me on Asylum.
It's about me now.
We both want Valkorion dead. We could have been allies.
We could've worked together.
You're collateral damage. Nothing more. Let Valkorion speak.
You are his vessel. He exists within you, somewhere. And he will answer me.
It's too late for that. He's a part of you now. Let him speak.
I've sacrificed too much to be met with silence.
I told you--he's gone. Guess you're not worth an appearance.
Did I stutter? He's not here.
Silence is all you're going to get. Valkorion's gone.
Valkorion's gone.
I came here to kill you, not listen to your daddy issues.
Enough whining.
I'd call him if I could, but it doesn't work like that.
Well, this is awkward.
My patience is wearing thin, Father.
Answer me!
Valkorion's mark on you runs deeper than I imagined.
Proof that he is still tied to you. You cannot hide from me, Father!
You had your chance to kill Valkorion on Zakuul--you failed.
You aren't strong enough.
I thought I had condemned him to a fate worse than death--trapped forever, forgotten and alone.
I won't make the same mistake twice. Answer me, Valkorion.
Your pleas for attention are pathetic. It's time to end you.
Enough of this. Time to fight.
